Raspberry Pi Pico Cluster

The goal of this project is to build a 8 Raspberry Pi Pico cluster to gain: - Physical intuition of how computers parallelize - A testbed for testing the scalability of different parallel algorithms - Explore optimizing energy as a variable of overall system performance - Familiarity with the Raspberry Pi ecosystem - Experience in basic electronics (especially in power)

There will be no fancy packaging. Just simple breadboard and wires to connect the picos.
